entry.title: Daily Review
entry.content:
Daily Review for 2019-01-07

Daily report: [2019-01-07 Mon]

File TODO Headline Time
ALL Total time 3:26
done.org File time 1:55
DONE Write “accountability” blog post 1:26
DONE Reviewing email 0:29
gtd.org File time 1:31
What I’m Doing Now 0:07
  Today’s Tasks 0:07
DONE     Configuring website 0:07
Routine 1:24
  Daily 1:24
    Morning Ritual 1:24
TODO       Meditation 0:16
TODO       Tea Ceremony 0:15
TODO       Journal writing 0:09
TODO       Review agenda, calendar, goals, habits and brain dump 0:13
TODO       Shower 0:16
TODO       Breakfast 0:15

2019-01-07 Monday

07:30 AM - Rise up! Rise up! Good morning

07:40 AM - Starting Task: Meditation

Starting meditation of 15 minutes using Headspace

07:56 AM - Completed Task: Meditation

Completed 15min Headspace meditation Thoughts: As the first task in the morning, I am dehydrated. Recommended to hydrate first thing in the morning.

07:58 AM - Starting Task: Tea Ceremony

Boiling hot water for morning tea.

08:13 AM - Completed Task: Tea Ceremony

Completed making first cup of tea in the morning. Thoughts: Start making tea when I begin doing my meditation, by the time I finish meditation my tea will be complete and I can begin doing journal writing with little to no downtime.

08:15 AM - Starting Task: Journal writing

Starting Journal Entry for the day.

08:24 AM - Completed Task: Journal writing

Completed journal writing. Started while doing boiling tea.

08:28 AM - Starting Task: Review agenda, calendar, goals, habits and brain dump

08:41 AM - Completed Task: Review agenda, calendar, goals, habits and brain dump

08:43 AM - Starting Task: Shower

08:59 AM - Completed Task: Shower

09:04 AM - Starting Task: Breakfast

09:19 AM - Completed Task: Breakfast

09:27 AM - Starting Task: Reviewing email

09:56 AM - Completed Task: Reviewing email

10:00 AM - Starting Task: Write “accountability” blog post

11:26 AM - Completed Task: Draft of ‘Accountability’ blog post

11:26 AM - Completed Task: Write “accountability” blog post

11:37 AM - Starting Task: Configuring website

11:44 AM - Completed Task: Configuring website

Setup Review section to include clocktable summary and timestamps of completed tasks for the day
